ComicInfo.Title: King Hot Dog; Lion's Share; Library Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
King Hot Dog: The Beach City Hot Dog Eating Contest is sabotaged when Amethyst's Fire Salt seasoning gets mixed in with the hot dogs.
Lion's Share: Lion tries to make up for incurring Pearl's ire.
Library Part Two: One of the items stored in Pearl's gem is a mysterious book that begins causing problems in order to get what it wants.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 08:08:41. [CVDB475984] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 05:14:55. [Issue ID 1307546]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bridget Underwood,Coleman Engle,Frans Boukas,Grace Kraft,Josceline Fenton
ComicInfo.Inker: Bridget Underwood,Coleman Engle,Frans Boukas,Grace Kraft,Josceline Fenton
ComicInfo.Characters: Sour Cream,Greg Universe,Mayor Bill Dewey,Harold Smiley,Amethyst,Jenny Pizza
